md:
giải nghĩa từ "superiors" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Superior (noun)
	* Meaning: A person who has a higher rank or position than someone else.
	* Vietnamese: cấp trên
	* Example sentence: "My superior at work is very supportive."
	* Related words: boss, manager, leader

2. Superior (adjective)
	* Meaning: Better or higher in quality, amount, or degree.
	* Vietnamese: cao hơn, tốt hơn
	* Example sentence: "This superior quality coffee is more expensive."
	* Related words: excellent, outstanding, exceptional

3. Superior (adjective)
	* Meaning: Feeling or showing that you are better than others.
	* Vietnamese: tự cao, kiêu ngạo
	* Example sentence: "He has a superior attitude towards people who are not as educated as him."
	* Related words: arrogant, condescending, haughty
html:
giải nghĩa từ "superiors" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Superior (noun)

    • Meaning: A person who has a higher rank or position than someone else.
    • Vietnamese: cấp trên
    • Example sentence: "My superior at work is very supportive."
    • Related words: boss, manager, leader

  2. Superior (adjective)

    • Meaning: Better or higher in quality, amount, or degree.
    • Vietnamese: cao hơn, tốt hơn
    • Example sentence: "This superior quality coffee is more expensive."
    • Related words: excellent, outstanding, exceptional

  3. Superior (adjective)

    • Meaning: Feeling or showing that you are better than others.
    • Vietnamese: tự cao, kiêu ngạo
    • Example sentence: "He has a superior attitude towards people who are not as educated as him."
    • Related words: arrogant, condescending, haughty
